## AttributeType enum

Value type of a user's attribute.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum AttributeType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Blob | <code>4</code> | The attribute can have a binary object value. |
|  Boolean | <code>1</code> | The attribute can have a boolean value. |
|  Integer | <code>2</code> | The attribute can have an integer value. |
|  String | <code>3</code> | The attribute can have a text value. |
